name: Ping Pong Baldi Remastered (Version 1.0.0.)
description:
Here's The Remastered Of A Game You Didn't Ask For:

Ping Pong Baldi REMASTERED!!

I Remade This Game Cause I Was Bored... So Yeah...

Original Game: https://oranio2010.itch.io/ping-pong-baldi

Controls: Use The Cursor To Move The Racket. That's It.

Credits:

Thanks To:

  • SplintaDinta For The Baldi Model;
  • Hudmaceachern For The Ping Pong Ball Code;
  • Griffpatch For The Number Counter Points Coding Tutorial;
  • Yoshi's Island Midi File Downloaded From KHInsider;
  • Audio Edited In Audacity;
  • Images Edited With Gimp & Scratch;
  • Background Images Made With Anim8or;
  • Bad Piggies Midi By Hammer's Midi Files & Edited In Mixcraft 9;
  • Micah McGonigal For Baldi's Basics. Thanks Man :) !!
